translations: v．宣判无罪，使免于责任：在法律程序中，判定某人无罪或免除其责任。
· The jury acquits the defendant of all charges.
陪审团判定被告在所有指控下无罪。

sentences.sentence: It is God who acquits us.
She acquits so will. And especially dialect. She knows how to face them in public.
sentences.translation: 她(获胜者)的表现很出色，尤其是语调，她懂得如何面对观众。

sentences.sentence: "The chamber finds you Mr. Haradinaj not guilty and therefore acquits you of all counts," he said.
sentences.translation: 奥列说：“本法庭认定哈拉迪纳伊先生你无罪。”因此，本法庭判定对你的所有指控无效。
